item.description:
NH's Premier First Amendment Assemblies!
Please join us at the all free, Live Free Or Die Celebration, with Monadnock 9/11 Truth Alliance & 18+ liberty Organizations at downtown Common and Bandstand in Jaffrey, NH.

Main Event Aug. 23, 11-5 PM, THEN the After Hours Aug.23 7PM on pristine 30 acre donated facility w/ mountain views,15+ Bands, 2 kegs gunpowder donated by Atlas Fireworks for 8 cannons Revolutionary Artillery Co., free camping & R.V. spots & more. Bring tent or camper, beverages, food to cook (grilles furnished if needed) & chairs.

The Third Annual "Live Free Or Die Rally"

New Hampshire's Premier First Amendment Assembly And After Hours Event

MAIN EVENT:
WHERE: Jaffrey, NH ,Downtown Common & Band Stand(1 River st.)
WHEN: Saturday, August 23rd 2008. 11 AM - 5 PM

Revolutionary guns and cannons re-enactments, speakers, bands, vendors and more!

ENCAMPMENT: Friday, August 22nd.,12-10PM ,Sawyers Field (5Min. From Downtown)

AFTER HOURS: Saturday, August 23rd 7PM through Sunday, August 24th, Secluded Historic Dillon Lodge (across from Sawyers Field) Bands,Barbecue & Breakfast.

Sawyer's Field open to public August 23rd, 7 PM - 10 PM for full battle re-enactment viewing, After Dark Cannons Volleys To Mt. Monadnock, music, food,vendors, pony rides, tours and more!

TOPICS:
US constitution second amendment gun rights
NH constitution preservation and amendment rights
The history and preservation of the NH motto
Radio frequency ID/spy chips/national ID privacy rights
Mount Monadnock mzone preservation
Medicinal Marijuana regulation legislation support
Constitutional religious rights enforcement
911 truths VS the 911 commision report
More to be announced

SPEAKERS:
Evan Nappen, Second amendment attorney "Gun Laws and The Constitution". John B. Hunt, NH House Representitive, "NH State Motto and Relation To Nanny Laws". Dr. Katherine Albrecht, Spychips author and Radio Host, "Privacy Rights Enforment". David Welch, "National Mandated ID and Privacy Rights".Daniel Itse,NH Liberty Alliance, "True Sovereigns Of New Hampshire".Matt Simon,NH Commonsense,"Marijuana Myths". Jonathon Perri, Students For Sensible Drug Policies, "Drug Policies Reforms". Howard Wilson, NH Libertarian Party, "Citizens Rights To Bear Arms".Garrett Lear, The Patriot Pastor "Heroes Of American Liberty" .Jennifer Coffey, NH Coordinator, Second amendment sisters, "Womans Gun Rights". George Corrette, Monadnock 911 Truth Alliance, "World Trade Towers Revelations".

ORGANIZATIONS/VENDORS:
New Hampshire Liberty Alliance,Free State Project, New Hampshire Libertarian Party, CASPIAN, National Heritage Center For Constitutional Studies, New Hampshire Common Sense, Second Amendment Sisters, Friends Of Immigration Law Enforcement, C.A.A.C.P., National Society Sons Of The American Revolution, The Well Of Living Water-Christian Ministries, Military Order Of The Purple Hearts, Students For Sensible Drug Policy, Monadnock 911 Truth Alliance, And More To Be Announced.

ARTILLERY DEMONSTRATIONS:
Captain Morrill's Company, Franklin, NH. Kegs gunpowder donated by Atlas Fire Works Co.

BANDS:
To Date, Poker Face Political Rock, Allentown, PA./ Mindsetx,Salem NH/ The Ale Marys,Littleton,MA./Lowercasep,Lowell Ma./ Goosepimp Orchestra,Lowell,Ma./Dream Line,Derry,NH/ Chord-Wood,Hampstead,NH/ Audio,Lighting & Benefit Bands Promotions Donated by Transit Music Group,Candia,NH.

Reservations For Free Organizational Booths And Camping Still Available.
Volunteers, Promoters and Fund Raisers Are Still Needed, Please Register. Thank You

Reservations & Info:
603-532-6711/8084

item.name: Live Free Or Die Rally w/ Monadnock 9/11 Truth
